text: Levar Marcus Stoney (born March 20, 1981) is an American politician. He was the 80th mayor of Richmond, Virginia from 2017 to 2025. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Stoney is running for Lieutenant Governor of Virginia in the 2025 election. He originally ran for governor, but dropped out in April 2024 to support Congresswoman Abigail Spanberger. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Richmond, Virginia Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Levar Stoney
